旇字的基本解释

旇
pī
旌旗披靡。

旇
bì
旌旗。
衣服貌。

旇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pī］
［《廣韻》敷覊切，平支，滂。］
(1)旌旗随风倒下。
(2)麾。
[②]［bì］
［《廣韻》平義切，去寘，並。］
(1)旌旗，旗帜。
(2)衣服貌。

旇字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【方字部】　旇； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页483第11
【廣韻】敷羈切【集韻】【韻會】攀糜切，?音披。【說文】旌旗旇靡也。【埤蒼】衣服貌也。　又【集韻】攀悲切，音丕。麾謂之旇。　又母被切，音靡。旌旗貌。　又平義切，音被。義同。

旇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
旇字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pī］
["Guangyun" apply cut, flat branch, peng. ]
(1) The banner fell with the wind.
(2) Shun.
[②]［bì］
["Guangyun" cut righteously, go to place, and merge. ]
(1) Banners, flags.
(2) Clothes appearance.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Mao Jixia】【Fangzi Department】　旇; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 483 No. 11
[Guang Yun] Fu Ji cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Pan Mi cut,? Yin Phi. [Said the text] The flags are also depressed. [Picang] The clothes look also.　[Jiyun] Climbing sorrow, sound pi. Nie said that it is 旾.　The mother was cut again, the sound was sluggish. Banner appearance.　Flat and righteous cut again, sound quilt. The same meaning.
